br.com.concepting.framework.util.helpers

Class RrdGraphDefinition

  • java.lang.Object
    • br.com.concepting.framework.util.helpers.RrdGraphDefinition

  • public class RrdGraphDefinition
extends java.lang.Object
    Classe que define as características de um gráfico baseado em um arquivo RRD.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    fvilarinho
